title: Is Male Infertility Contributing to Falling Birth Rates?
description: RFK, Jr. is exercised about falling birth rates and depicts falling sperm count as a major contributor. How sound is this view?
content: Yves here. All around the world, there is ample evidence of human activity level exceeding what the planet can support, from an huge level of species die off to global warming induced wild weather ch… [+12560 chars]
